text: This is a list of Italian television related events from 2009. ==Events== *21 March - Emanuele Filiberto, Prince of Venice and Piedmont and his partner Natalia Titova win the fifth season of Ballando con le stelle. *19 April - Matteo Becucci wins the second season of X Factor. *20 April - Ferdi Berisa wins the ninth season of Grande Fratello. *2 December - Marco Mengoni wins the third season of X Factor. ==Debuts== ===International=== *2 December - United States of Tara (Mya) (2009–2011) ==Television shows== ===2000s=== *Grande Fratello (2000–present) *Ballando con le stelle (2005–present) *X Factor (2008–present) ==Ending this year== ==Births== ==Deaths== {| class="wikitable" |- " ! Date || Name || Age || Cinematic Credibility |- |28 March |Renata Mauro |74 |Italian television presenter |- |8 September |Mike Bongiorno |85 |American-born Italian TV host |- |} ==See also== *2009 in Italy *List of Italian films of 2009
title: 2009 in Italian television
